Monster Characteristics
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): FAQ: The Most Important Game Info: Monster Characteristics
By Trickster on Thursday, September 27, 2001 - 11:43 pm:

Under Construction

CharacteristicGame TextEffect
Active"I can't just sit around all day..."*
AquaphobicHates to even see water. Swimming is out of the question.*
ArmorDamage is decreased but has a hard time dodgingS.E.
ArthritisShoulders hurt & is easily irritableIllness
BruiseA bruise incurred in battle. Should heal by the next week"Illness" that quickly fades
Charming EyeIncreases the effect of charm attacksS.E.
ChlorophyllPerforms photo-synthesis during rest to self-heal*
Clean"I need to take a bath everyday"*
ColdWind bring many diseases. Lets be carefulIllness
Cold LimbsWeak against cold. Hands and feet start to hurtmonster doesn't do well in cold climates
Confident"I won't lose. No matter what!"*
Dark AuraTraps soul in darkness. Less prone to enemy Heart attacksS.E.
DimplesCharm point that can be seen when laughing*
Dim-witted"Oh?... I didn't realize that... "*
DirectionlessIt's an adventure no matter where it goes*
Dry SkinFatigue and stress are the enemies of beautymonster is more stressed & fatigued by drills than normal
Easily TiredDoesn't feel well and gets tired easily than usualIllness
Earth SecretsGreatly increases the damage done by earth by Earth attacksS.E.
Earth WisdomSlightly increases the damage done by Earth attacksS.E.
Eats AnythingLoses Preference for foods but any food eaten is okayAll food preference at feeding is at two blocks
Extra TeethCharm point that can be seen when laughing*
Fast FootworkDodges attacks more often but Hit damage increases*
Fire WisdomIncreases the damage done by Flame attacksS.E.
Flame SecretsGreatly Increases damage done by Flame attacksS.E.
Flexible TailIncreases the accuracy rate of Tail attacksS.E.
Gluttonous"I want to eat some more..."*
GourmetBecomes picky with its food*
GreedyI want this. Oh, and this, too.*
Groovy MovesIncreases effects of Dance attacksS.E.
Hard ScalesDamage is decreased but it has a hard time dodgingS.E.
Hay FeverSneezes a lot during the spring & is easily stressedIllness
Head Bang**
Heart WisdomSlightly increases the Guts damage done by Heart attacksS.E.
Heat-ProofingA special covering that blocks out heathelps resist Fire attacks
High OutputIncreases damage from beam attacks*
HypotensionDoesn't wake up easily. Ugh morning already?*
Ice WisdomSlightly increases the damage done by Ice attacksS.E.
InsulationA special covering that doesn't allow electricity through.defends against lightning
Intuitive"You're not telling me everything..."helps monster dodge attacks
Illusion CapeConfuses the enemy making dodging easier*
Iron FistsSlightly increases the damage done by fistsS.E.
Iron HeartToughens the monster so it doesn't get tired easilyhelps with all drills
Jell BodyReduces damage from Hit attacksS.E.
Life SecretsSignificantly increases the damage from life attacksS.E.
Life WisdomSlightly increases the damage done by life attacksS.E.
Light AuraLess susceptible to enemy magic attacksS.E.
Lightning SecretsGreatly increases the amount of damage done by lightning attacksS.E.
Lightning WisdomSlightly increases the damage done by Lightning attacksS.E.
Loud VoiceSlightly increases the damage done by voice attacksS.E.
Lung CapacitySlightly increases the damage done by Breath attacksS.E.
Magic WisdomSlightly increases the damage done by Magic attacksS.E.
MigraineA bad headache makes a monster irritableIllness

NarcissisticI am absolutely gorgeous aren't I?*
NearsightedCan see things up close but can't see well far away*

SleeplessCan't sleep well so rest time does not help much*

SweatyDoesn't like hot regions but doesn't hate them either*
